core.utils package¶

Submodules¶

core.utils.common module¶

core.utils.common.agent_payroll_view(req, pk)¶

Returns the page where all payroll logs is present for a specific user.

core.utils.common.approved_disputes(req)¶
core.utils.common.declined_disputes(req)¶
core.utils.common.dictfetchall(cursor)¶

Return all rows from a cursor as a dict

core.utils.common.sup_om_gen_report(req)¶

Returns a csv for supervisors and operations manager when they want to download the disputes log.
